responses.rationale: Factual reporting of case locations without explicit framing cues. Defaults to Neutral.
Factual reporting of virus confirmation and bird count without explicit framing cues. Defaults to Neutral.
Factual description of disease spread mechanism without explicit framing cues. Defaults to Neutral.
Factual reporting of infections and bird culling numbers without explicit framing cues. Defaults to Neutral.
Factual reporting of national bird culling numbers and types without explicit framing cues. Defaults to Neutral.
Factual reporting of Iowa bird culling numbers and timeframe without explicit framing cues. Defaults to Neutral.
